about-subtitle: For the legal and Human Resources communities
about-paragraph-1: Quid Lingua is a French-English and English-French translation service provided by Audrey Pouligny, a legal professional, with an in-depth knowledge of civil law and common law.
about-paragraph-2: Audrey is a French and American dual citizen. She holds Master’s Degrees in private civil law, international employment and labor law, as well as common law and comparative law, from the Universities of Panthéon-Assas Paris II, Lumière Lyon II, and Descartes Paris V.
about-paragraph-3: She is licensed to practice law in France and has litigation experience in both France and the U.S., spanning multiple practice areas. She also has in-depth experience providing legal advice on a wide array of employment matters.
about-paragraph-4: Audrey is a member of the Northern California Translators Association (NCTA). She prides herself on offering insightful translations with real legal and HR know-how.
services-subtitle: Leverage broad, clear interpretation of legal issues that enables you to best serve your clients' needs.
services-item-translation-text: Insightful French and English translations with real legal and HR know-how.
services-item-editing-text: Refine translated texts by incorporating preferred glossary terminology and style specifications.
services-item-proofreading-text: Thorough review of translated texts to ensure clear interpretation of legal issues and terminology consistency.
services-item-doc-review-text: Create terminology glossaries and style guides to eliminate uncertainty in the translation process.
services-item-glossary-text: Assist clients with French document review during e-discovery process.
services-item-last-one-text: Assist Englih-speaking and French-speaking clients during legal and HR meetings.
clients-subtitle: Build a more direct and practical relationship with a translator who understands your legal and HR needs.
contact-subtitle1: Request a quote from Quid Lingua for your next translation.
contact-subtitle2: Project scope, timing and terms can be customized to meet your needs.
